discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment:
BTW, as an alternative to `iter_addr_0`, the following lemma is slightly general and seems to be useful.
```coq
Lemma iter_addr n (m : V) p : iter n (+%R m) p = m *+ n + p.
Proof. by elim: n => [|n ih]; rewrite ?add0r //= ih mulrS addrA. Qed.
```

New iteration/bigop lemmas in ssralg

- Add `iter_addr`, `iter_mulr(_1)`, and `prodr_const_nat`.
- Export `iter_addr_0`, `sumr_const_nat`, and the above lemmas from
